text: I was glad to welcome Air Force Lt. Col. Jeremiah Aleki Alefosio, Commander of the 30th Logistics Readiness Squadron at Vandenberg Space Force Base, to our office. He’s in D.C. for the AF Advanced Logistics Readiness Course. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/kJHqLgDMqL

I welcome House passage of the bipartisan PARTNER Act, strengthening U.S. ties with Pacific Islands Forum, ASEAN & others. 🌊🤝

“This is another way to show our nation’s commitment to the Pacific region.”

#PARTNERAct #IndoPacific

Saddened to hear of the fire at the Nitijela building. Thank God no one was hurt. I’m told the building will have to be reconstructed from the ground up. I will do all I can to help RMI in their restoration efforts. https://t.co/BYrf7ImUiI https://t.co/OOl7kW18ho

(9/9) Thankful for our dedicated Pacific diplomats and the East-West Center—a vital hub for promoting peace, cooperation, and understanding across our island nations. 🌐 #EastWestCenter #IslandUnity #AmataInAction https://t.co/ipkgPvIJkD

(8/9) Pacific security remains a priority. The President’s initiative will direct $30B+ to Indo-Pacific defense projects & U.S. Coast Guard resources. A vital investment in regional stability. #PacificSecurity #USCoastGuard

(7/9) “The President heard my request to reopen fishing in the PRIMNM,” I noted. “His focus on removing barriers to economic efficiency helps both large & small jurisdictions like ours.” #Fisheries #IslandEconomies

(6/9) When American Samoa was mistakenly included in a 10% tariff order, quick coordination with the White House & DHS helped resolve it. Clear communication with DC makes a difference. #ResultsMatter #AmericanSamoa

(5/9) We discussed the impact of new trade deals with the EU & Japan—expected to generate $2T+ in investments. I emphasized the need for adjustments for small, remote economies like ours. #EconomicGrowth #PacificTrade

(4/9) “I will work closely with Gov. Apatang, Rep. Kimberlyn King-Hinds & all of you to foster a secure & prosperous Pacific,” I said. “While my influence is limited, I believe Congress has a welcoming ear for our region.” #CongressionalUpdates #IndoPacific

(3/9) Present were:
🇵🇼 Palau – Consul General Uchel Raley Naito
🇲🇭 RMI – Consul General Glansay Enos
🇫🇲 FSM – Acting Consul General Henry Shrew & James Naich
🇦🇺 Australia – Deputy Consul General John Pumpa
🇹🇴 Tonga – Hon. Consul Annie Kaneshiro
🇬🇧 UK – Hon. Consul Midori Akamine
#IslandNations

(2/9) This roundtable took place en route to the funeral of my dear friend, Governor Arnold Palacios of the Northern Marianas. I opened with remarks honoring his leadership and legacy. #IslandLeadership #MarianasStrong https://t.co/ehGjkp8efg

(1/🧵I had the honor of joining a roundtable hosted by the Pacific Consular Corps at the East-West Center in Hawai‘i. A meaningful time to share congressional updates and engage with leaders across our Pacific region. #AmataInAction #PacificPartners https://t.co/UTysxRO8iI

“Happy birthday to the U.S. Coast Guard, celebrating 235 years of service to the nation! … Thank you to every Coast Guardsman, and we pray for your strength and safety.”

#USCG235 #SemperParatus #AmericanSamoa https://t.co/DzDAXSuUQY

3/3
I’m advocating for American Samoa to be considered as a new Coast Guard home port. Our harbor is ideal and signals strong U.S. commitment to the Pacific. A full port assessment is the right step forward. 🇺🇸⚓
#AmericanSamoa #CongresswomanAmata #PortAssessment #IndoPacific https://t.co/7QfLL9bqm3

2/3
The bill improves acquisition, shipbuilding, safety, and support for Coast Guard members. It advances tech innovation and cracks down on illegal, unreported, and unregulated (IUU) fishing across U.S. waters.
#MaritimeSecurity #IUUfishing #PacificRegion #BipartisanSupport

🧵1/3
The House passed the Coast Guard Authorization Act of 2025 (H.R. 4275) with strong bipartisan support: 399–12. This major bill funds the @USCG through FY2029 and boosts its mission to protect borders, ensure maritime safety & fight illegal trafficking.
#CoastGuard #USHouse https://t.co/Ehli8YBGQI

We’ve lost a true ambassador of Pacific music. George “Fiji” Veikoso’s voice united generations and cultures.
“His spirit, rooted in love and truth, will continue to live on in every note of his music.”
Ia manuia lau malaga, Fiji. Moce mada, turaga vinaka.
#RIPFiji https://t.co/MnV4fsdLtO

🚤 Proud to cosponsor H.R. 3858—the Sport Fish Restoration & Boating Safety Act—passed unanimously in Committee! This bipartisan bill supports boating access, fisheries, and wildlife. “Happy to support outdoor activities & healthy habitats.” #AmericanSamoa #IslandLife https://t.co/ntaGOcd6Wa

Happy Manu’a Flag Day 2025! 🇺🇸🎉 Honoring the 1904 flag-raising when Ta’u, Ofu & Olosega joined the U.S. Proud to celebrate with Manu’a and honor our Matai forefathers’ wisdom. Fa’afetai, Manu’a! 🇦🇸 #ManuaFlagDay #AmericanSamoa #IslandPride

We do not own music rights https://t.co/qd6ijCjB7k

USCGC Harriet Lane hosted our district staff & local partners, strengthening ties with American Samoa. “More is better” for USCG here, as I’ve said. Their presence ensures safety, lawful fishing & U.S. commitment in the Pacific. 🇺🇸⚓️ #USCG #HarrietLane https://t.co/pkroQfk7eg

While home in American Samoa, I was grieved by the attacks on MN lawmakers. I support the bipartisan resolution rejecting political violence. We must stand united in peace and democracy. 🇺🇸 #Unity #CongresswomanAmata #AmericanSamoa

“Happy Father’s Day to all the dads and grandfathers in American Samoa and everywhere… You are loved, respected and honored. Enjoy this weekend and the lifelong blessings of being fathers.”

Proverbs 17:6
Proverbs 20:7
#FathersDay #AmericanSamoa #FaafetaiTama https://t.co/4EcTQbj6hj

I’ve listened to our people…I represent you. I stand with you.

I will encourage our people to take part…

https://t.co/SAmSDIDhem

Celebrating 250 years of the U.S. Army 🇺🇸
“O le agaga tautua e le galo.” — The spirit of service is never forgotten.

Honoring Toa o Samoa past & present.
#Army250 #ToaOSamoa #FaithFamilyFreedom https://t.co/zc7Aq13g3C

These islands in PRIMNM are America’s-not just Hawaiian or Samoan. Food security is national security. I thank President Trump for acting on our Flag Day to protect our tuna supply. He listened to Am. Samoa when others did not. #FaaSamoa #FlagDay #TunaIndustry

“On Memorial Day, we are forever grateful to those Service Members who sacrificed all in the cause of freedom.”

We remember our fallen heroes—including our Toa o Samoa—and honor their legacy.
#MemorialDay #HonorTheFallen #ToaOSamoa #MilitaryFamilies https://t.co/3mD1ZIShe2

Fa’afetai to all who joined the senior town hall at TAOA! Updates included Medicaid, Social Security, and senior services. No changes to benefits—Medicaid match stays at 83%. Grateful for our elders & your voices! #AmataInAction #ServingSeniors #AmericanSamoa #TAOACenter https://t.co/9pOoUiOZVK

I’m deeply saddened and outraged by the horrific murder of Yaron Lischinsky and Sarah Milgrim. They were targeted in DC for being Jewish. We must stand united against antisemitism. These vibrant lives mattered. Our hearts go out to their families and community.

American Samoa’s Close Up students visited Congresswoman Amata’s DC office for a homemade lunch & Capitol tour! While the Congresswoman is on island for graduations, her staff was proud to host these future leaders. “Always a joy to see our students,” she said. #CloseUp2025 https://t.co/rYZDBFebNb

The House just passed bill—the South Pacific Tuna Treaty Act (H.R. 531)—with bipartisan support! This strengthens U.S. ties with 16 Pacific nations, supports our distant water fleet in Pago Pago, and protects American Samoa’s marine economy.
#TunaTreaty #AS https://t.co/9D3hnTKdmy

Joined @SenCortezMasto @SenJoniErnst & @RepEdCase to introduce a bipartisan bill strengthening U.S. ties with Pacific Islands.Proud to be part of this effort to support diplomacy, development, & regional security. #PacificPartnershipAct #AmericanSamoa #PacificIslands

Motherhood is a great joy... ‘Train up a child in the way he should go...’ (Proverbs 22:6)... ‘Her children rise up and call her blessed,’ (Proverbs 31:28). God bless you this Mother’s Day.”
#MothersDay #CongresswomanAmata #Proverbs31 #FaithAndFamily https://t.co/UqO6NJzGdf

As one of over a billion Catholics worldwide, I welcome the announcement of Pope Leo XIV with joy. His historic Papacy—first U.S.-born Pope, with ties to South America—begins with a message of unity and peace. We look forward with hope.
#PopeLeoXIV #CatholicChurch #UnityAndPeace

🇺🇸 Today we celebrate Victory Day, proclaimed by President Trump to honor the end of WWII. American Samoa stood with the U.S.—with the Fita Fita Guard and heroes like Peter T. Coleman, a Pearl Harbor survivor & Guadalcanal vet.
#VictoryDay #WWII #AmericanSamoa https://t.co/3peDpGXkEG

Congresswoman Aumua Amata and her adventurous pups are celebrating #NationalPetWeek in American Samoa! Let’s honor the joy pets bring by committing to responsible care—keeping them healthy, happy & safe.
#NPW2025 #PetsOfAmericanSamoa #ResponsiblePetCare @AVMAvets https://t.co/Nwcws2EiUZ

Cheering on Hazel Ipuniuesea Leo of Masefau, a senior at Iakina Adventist Academy, as she represents American Samoa at the Poetry Out Loud National Semifinals in D.C.! Fa’amalosi Hazel!

#AmericanSamoaProud #PoetryOutLoud #StudentVoices #MasefauStrong https://t.co/ssk11C44tz

#TeacherAppreciationWeek (May 5–9) and #NationalTeacherDay (May 6):

“Thank you, Teachers, for your time and energy… May God bless you, and your students through you!” – Uifa’atali Amata 🇦🇸📚

On #NationalAstronautDay, we celebrate American Samoa’s historic role in space history—from Apollo splashdowns near our shores to astronaut Christina Koch’s time as NOAA Chief in Pago Pago.

A small island with a big place in the NASA story.
#NASA #ApolloMissions #ChristinaKoch https://t.co/b7jAdxcNgI

🤝 We also met with British American business leaders to discuss economic ties and innovation that benefit both our nations.
Grateful to represent American Samoa as we strengthen these important partnerships abroad.
#AmericanSamoa #PacificVoicesAbroad https://t.co/hn28jRug8Y

🇬🇧 Kicked off our bipartisan U.S. Congressional Delegation trip in London.
Met with Speaker of the House of Commons Sir Lindsay Hoyle & Foreign Secretary David Lammy.
The U.S.–U.K. alliance remains vital—across security, trade, and shared values.
#USUKRelations #AmataInAction https://t.co/CTvObNXkdf

Thank you to every Army Reserve Soldier serving across the nation, and especially those we know and love in American Samoa. 🇺🇸

“Our beautiful tropical islands are bright green and full of life… With Earth Day, National Park Week, and Arbor Day, we have three good reminders of these natural blessings.”
Celebrating the only U.S. National Park south of the equator in American Samoa. #EarthDay #ArborDay https://t.co/M7mdluBLfJ

🎉 Big news on American Samoa’s 125th Flag Day!
President Trump just signed a Proclamation restoring fishing access in PRIMNM—boosting jobs, U.S. tuna, food security & keeping tabs on China.
“This sensible Proclamation is important…”
#MAFA #TunaVictory #FlagDayWin https://t.co/zPx7N2gJ3t

@MikeZooLoo Ua Fa’afetai’ is a beloved Samoan hymn of gratitude, sung to thank God for His love, kindness, and blessings. A song from the heart of Samoa—heard in churches, homes, and family gatherings around the world. #Samoa #UaFaafetai #Gratitude

Today marks 125 years of shared history with the United States.

🇦🇸 Happy Flag Day, American Samoa! 🇺🇸

Featured: Art based on historic photos of Saugelau Hill, USS Abarenda, and Mrs. Henry Hudson—the first Navy wife to live in American Samoa—raising the flag in 1900.
#FlagDay #125Years #AmericanSamoa #PagoPago

🎉 Happy Birthday to the U.S. Air Force Reserve!
Founded on April 14, 1948.
Thank you to all who serve—providing combat-ready forces to fly, fight & win! 🇺🇸
#AirForceReserve #USAF #MilitaryAppreciation #FlyFightWin https://t.co/R5Q8htinFY

This week we celebrate 125 years of Flag Day in American Samoa!
A time to honor our history, people, and shared values.
God bless American Samoa and the USA!
#FlagDay125 #AmericanSamoa #125YearsStrong https://t.co/tJrSfgSIs4
